import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../../_css/Services.css' import gsap from 'gsap' function Services() { const [open, isOpen] = useState(true); const openServicesMenu = (bool) => { let arrow = document.querySelector(".iconArrow") let expandable = document.querySelector(".servicesTabs li") if(open){ arrow.classList.remove("downArrow") arrow.classList.add("upArrow") if(window.clientWidthX < 600){ gsap.to(expandable, 1, {height:600}) }else{ gsap.to(expandable, 1, {height:200}) } isOpen(false) }else{ arrow.classList.remove("upArrow") arrow.classList.add("downArrow") gsap.to(expandable, 1, {height:10}) isOpen(true) } } return ( <>

Services

  • Advertising

    • Media Agencies
    • Ad Spaces
    • B2B & B2C
    • Account Direction
    • Project Management

  • Creative Design

    • Multiple Platform
      • {/* TVC, Billboards, Banners, Websites, Applications */}
    • Expert Designers & Developers
    • Artwork / Retouching
    • Asset Management
    • Professional & Swift Turnaround

  • Consultation

    • Top Results
    • Expert Market Knowledge
    • Research & Quality Feedback
    • Quantitative & Qualitative Insight
    • Access Performance Analytics
openServicesMenu(true)} className="iconArrow">

Find out how we can help your business

) } export default Services;
